H0.text: How many legs does a ladybird have. 4

H1.text: How many legs does a ladybird have. 8

H2.text: How many legs does a ladybird have. 10

H3.text: How many legs does a ladybird have. 6

A4.text: The thorax is that part from which all three pairs of legs and both pairs of wings arise.

A5.text: Many adult insects use six legs for walking, with an alternating tripod gait.
